content: SPX Universal diamond cup wheel (flat) Ultimate diamond cup wheel for angle grinders – for faster grinding of concrete, screed and natural stone ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate grinding speed – specially shaped segments and larger, high-quality abrasive diamonds help you to remove more material in less time Ultimate lifetime – steel body engineered to remove dust more effectively, helping to prevent clogged abrasive surfaces Advanced cooling – patented cooling pins work to prevent damage to the cup wheel segments due to overheating Robust – these cup wheels are built from the highest-grade materials using durable contact welding Minimized vibration – every cup wheel is individually checked and balanced before leaving the plant Applications Grinding concrete and natural stone ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder Base material: Concrete, Screed, Natural stone Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder | Base material | Concrete, Screed, Natural stone | Product Class | Ultimate | Arbor size | 5/8 in ### ITEMS- 2238541 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 4 SPX univ - Package Size 1 pc - 2238542 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 4 1/2 SPX univ - Package Size 1 pc - 2238543 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 5 SPX univ - Package Size 1 pc - 2238544 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 7 SPX univ - Package Size 1 pc
